assert.h

00001 // we'll allow this file to be included multiple times
00002 // since assert() might be re-defined in many places
00003 #include <lang/pp.h>
00004 #include <lang/internalError.h>
00005 
00006 // Workaround for NGI SDK 1.0, which does not define NULL in assert.h, but references it
00007 #if defined(PLATFORM_NGI) && !defined(NULL)
00008 #include <sys/_null.h>
00009 #endif
00010 
00011 // by default, we'll be using CRT assert
00012 #include <assert.h>
00013 
00014 // check if non-debug assert is requested
00015 #ifdef NDEBUG_ASSERT
00016 #undef assert
00017 #define assert(E) if (E) {} else {NS(lang,internalError)(__FILE__,__LINE__,#E);}
00018 #endif // NDEBUG_ASSERT
